name: Oath of the Ancients
description: Paladins who swear the Oath of the Ancients pledge themselves to protecting the light, life, and beauty of the world against the encroaching darkness.

Oath Spells.description: You always have certain spells prepared.

3.Nature's Wrath: As a Channel Divinity action, spectral vines spring up and reach for a creature within 10 feet. The creature must succeed on a Strength or Dexterity save (its choice) or be Restrained. While Restrained, the creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, it frees itself and the vines vanish.
3.Turn the Faithless: As a Channel Divinity action, each Fey or Fiend within 30 feet that can see or hear you must make a Wisdom save or be Turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage.

7.Aura of Warding: You and friendly creatures within 10 feet have Resistance to damage from spells. At 18th level, range increases to 30 feet.

15.Undying Sentinel: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest. Additionally, you don't suffer the drawbacks of old age, and you can't be aged magically.

20.Elder Champion: As a Bonus Action, you assume the form of a force of nature for 1 minute. During this time, you gain the following benefits: At the start of each of your turns, you regain 10 Hit Points; Whenever you cast a Paladin spell with a casting time of an action, you can cast it as a Bonus Action instead; Enemy creatures within 10 feet have Disadvantage on saving throws against your Paladin spells and Channel Divinity options. Once used, can't use again until Long Rest.
